website_summaries.verdict: A reliable waterproof mascara that provides definition, length, and curl.
pros: Adds volume and length without clumping or flaking
Gives a subtle curl to lashes
Stays on in the pool and in the rain without running or smearing
Doesn’t smudge, even if you accidentally sleep with it on
cons: Applicator brush is a little on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This is not waterproof as it was stated in the description when I purchased. And I looked specifically for that since that would be all I would wear. Unfortunately it isn't, and it can not be returned. Added picture. What I received is on left. The two on the right I bought at the big box store. They are marked with “waterproof” on package, top left in blue. So since I can’t return, $7 in trash bin.
customer_reviews.author: caymaii

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof mascara!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mascara I use and it's getting harder to find everyday! Two coats is all you need and most important, I can remove it easily with water. I wear contacts so I really can't use makeup remover and all the others practically rip out my eyelashes trying to remove them. Love this mascara!!
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, long lashes!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is my go-to! I’m just sad it’s not sold in stores anymore. Thankfully, Amazon comes to the rescue! It’s not thick and goopy, zero lumps or clumps, and it goes on smoothly without dragging your lashes through the ringer. It’s definitely more on the subtle side — not intended for volume but more for the purpose of adding length. It stays all day in South Florida heat without budging or smudging. The only con (which is true of nearly all waterproof mascaras) is that it’s very difficult to get off with soap and water alone. An effective make up remover is necessary, so keep that in mind when you purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure this is not the real thing...
customer_reviews.text: I have now ordered this at least twice, believing it to be the mascara I have bought at CVS (pharmacy) locally. The first time I ordered it here, I thought the product was just old. This time, I am quite sure it is not Lashexact waterproof. It clumps as it goes on, chips off all day - definitely not the CoverGirl product I was used to. I realize the real thing is discontinued, but don't buy this product here, thinking it's the last of the good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Thalia

customer_reviews.title: perfect for short, sparse lashes
customer_reviews.text: The real test for a mascara is when you're half way through your day and beyond. A lot of cheap mascaras will look good once applied then flake off and lose their muster by midday. I was happily surprised that this did not! Especially for the super low price! The brush is perfect for short, sparse lashes. Too big of a brush and you can't get close enough to the roots without smudging; too small and there's nothing for your lashes to grip on to. This created long, defined, very black lashes that lasted until I took it off at night. Plus it was easy too remove with a makeup towelette reducing lash loss.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Lind

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for Exact Eyelights
customer_reviews.text: A good replacement for my discontinued favorite CoverGirl Exact Eyelights mascara. I don't care for the purple packaging - it makes me feel like I'm in middle school again and not in a good way - but the product itself applies easily, isn't too wet, separates and lengthens without clumps. I feel like it's not quite as long-lasting as the Exact Eyelights waterproof formula was, but that's probably a good thing - I don't lose any eyelashes when I'm using makeup remover pads to clean it off.
customer_reviews.author: September

customer_reviews.title: WORST MASK-ERA EVER
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to have some waterproof maskers for a wedding !......what a fiasco it was full of spikes so bad it was like putting on dirt.... It took me forever just to comb out the balls of spikes to get it off without ruining my eyelashes... I got so mad i threw it out now i wished i would have waited to return it
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Gooey, messy, not like in store quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this in store before and love how easily it goes on, isn't messy and is easy to reach the corners. For some reason, the purchase from Amazon item has been terrible. It's a gooey mess, I have to apply it then clean the lashes with my fingers to get all the goop off and make them not look like spider leg lashes. It seems perhaps these sold on Amazon were in the 'throw back' bunch that didn't make it to in store distribution. Very disappointed as I bought 2 to stock and they are poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This particular mascara is quite difficult to find in stores and it happens to be my friend's favorite. It arrived quickly and packaged appropriately. It made a great addition to her birthday gift basket and she was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: LEEANN SULLIVAN

customer_reviews.title: This is not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you do not choose the wrong one. While searching for waterproof mascara, this option came up and I didn’t catch that it wasn’t actually waterproof. It is also not eligible to return, so guess I’m eating that one.
customer_reviews.author: slove

customer_reviews.title: Not a dupe for They're Real
customer_reviews.text: This was proclaimed by Pinterest to be a dupe for the "They're Real" mascara ( one of my fovorites but the price tag is not) this clumps easily if you're not careful and gets really gummy on the lashes. Very hard to take off even with eye makeup remover. If you do one thin coat it looks okay but it is NOT at all like the They're Real mascara. I learned my lesson. With some things you really do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Wendling

customer_reviews.title: Good mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. My local Wal-Mart has stopped carrying it, so I turned to Subscribe and Save. My favorite part is the wand--it doesn't make clumps. My ONLY problem is that it seemed like my first shipment was old--the mascara wasn't as "fluid-y" (if that makes sense). I'll try to remember and update when my 2nd shipment comes in.
customer_reviews.author: jstroo

customer_reviews.title: Smelled very strongly
customer_reviews.text: Lashexact has been my go-to mascara for a long time, though not the waterproof, so that could be the reason for the change. This tube smelled pretty strongly of chemicals and just that...unintentionally synthetic smell that most makeup companies try to avoid. I might've received an expired tube, or maybe that's just how waterproof mascara smells (I don't normally use it and bought it by accident, I have to admit) but I wasn't comfortable using this so close to my eyes and tossed it.
customer_reviews.author: LVS

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. Use a waterproof makeup remover, I like Loreal Artiste eye makeup remover. When I curl my lashes, it doesn't uncurl them and it doesn't clump up or flake. I like it more than Tarte, Benefit, Too Faced...I've tried so many and I still go back to this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photo - not new product
customer_reviews.text: These are not the recent packaging or production run as pictured. These are the older packaging style, so this is very old product. (Separate wand with beveled handle as opposed to the more recent straight design.) Several had “Intended for sale at CVS” stickers on them. Alas, with a discontinued product I don’t have any better choice.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: When I buy stuff, I rely on reviews and they're usually right, but not this time. I don't know how this product has so many good reviews. This mascara transfers to your eyelid when applying, doesn't go on evenly, doesn't make the eyelashes look thicker, doesn't make them look longer. Nothing it was a disaster. It's water resistant.. So it's harder to take off too
customer_reviews.author: G Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It's The Best As Well As My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is My Favorite Mascara , I like it because it doesn't clump and makes my lashes appear full and my lashes are thin I Highly Recommend It It's A Really Good Mascara ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: Elizagail

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not too thick. Nice thin brush. I put it on right after shower while lashes are still moist. Comes off easy with some coconut oil. Looks lovely. Doesn't bother my eyes like some do. Natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny S.

customer_reviews.title: Dryer than a 3 month old tube
customer_reviews.text: Just opened it and tried using it. Horrible!!! I used to use this kind constantly and switched for a few years and had high hopes returning to it. It was awful!!! I’m literally throwing it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cover Girl Exact Lash
customer_reviews.text: I have always LOVED this product... can no longer find it in the stores... I bought it once before on Amazon and it was great! This time I purchased 2 and they were horrible... all dried out... seemed like there was no mascara in them at all! Won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Good for everyday wear. The Very Black may be a little too black for me. It's an intense black. I usually buy the black/brown but wanted to try something different. Easy to remove, easy to apply. After several weeks the mascara becomes a little clumpy on the brush and on the lashes and harder to apply. I replace often. Price is right.
customer_reviews.author: MYD

customer_reviews.title: It contained almost no mascara solution
customer_reviews.text: waste of money-couldn't use it-all it did was wet my lash, I had older mascaras that have a lot more solution after using countless times.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Hall

customer_reviews.title: All-Time Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This mascara has been my go-to for YEARS! The brush separates every lash and there are no clumps! I’ve tried a LOT of mascaras, and I always come back to this one. It’s very black, doesn’t smudge, and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: K McNair

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mascara, been using it for years
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara, no other mascara compares, not even the expensive brands. Can’t find max factor anymore, but I love the lash exact waterproof. It lasts for most the day, stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Not bad..just not as dark and thick as I prefer.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would be the bast product behind the discontinued Exact Eyelights mascara but is not as good and flakes a little more too. Still..looks better than any other after a funeral's worth of crying or over night.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara hands down
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this mascara for over 10 years and it’s seriously the best ever. It became hard to find in stores so naturally I went to Amazon... I prefer to curl my lashes before applying mascara and this is the ONLY brand that does NOT weigh down my lashes ! I’ve tried several other brands including high end mascara but was left unsatisfied every time..This mascara gives my lashes the length and volume that I love . Can’t beat it especially for this price :)
customer_reviews.author: Tia C

customer_reviews.title: Good mascara
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed initially because it didn't seem to work very well. After three uses it works very well now it is not very easy to remove with soap and water so you might need mascara remover. It does have a chemical smell but that's not really a problem and it doesn't bother my sensitive eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne J

customer_reviews.title: My most favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: I've started to have a hard time finding this mascara...have used it for years as my all-time favorite. I originally, 'back in the day,' used a comb-on style mascara for many years...but it is almost impossible to find. Then I became mascara companies' best friend as I went on a quest trying many different brands in order to duplicate the nice end result that I always had with the comb style applicator. This product is the winner. The lashs do not clump together...but look terrific. As long as they sell it, I will buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Biller Gal

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite mascara. I've tried MANY different mascaras over the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. I've tried MANY different mascaras over the years and I always come back to this one. It doesn't make lashes stiff or clumpy. Elongates, separates and makes them really stand out. Unfortunately im having a hard time finding it in stores lately. I hope they arent discontinuing it.
customer_reviews.author: Lesser

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mascara for several years. They started to discontinue carrying it at the stores in my area so I decided to try the falsies mascara. Falsies mascara gives a more dramatic look, but can sometimes rub off a little and sometimes look like dark circles under your eye (even the waterproof). The lash exact is a little more of a subtle look, but has a lot more staying power and I never have problems with lash exact clumping. Separates your lashes and they stay lifted all day. I hope this mascara never goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this to replace my CoverGirl LashBlast mascara. This is NOT WATERPROOF as advertised. It started running and melting off my eyes just from a light rain shower, and easily smudges. It works otherwise fine, but is absolutely not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibele product!!
customer_reviews.text: I purschased this 3-Pack-Mr Shield For iPhone 6/iPhone 6S [Tempered Glass] Screen Protector and it is hands down the BEST screen protecter i have ever used! Not only did one screen last from February to November, it barely had any damage at all. I use my phone for work in a professional kitchen as well as for the rest of my day...fanatstic , simple to use wonderful product for an INCREDIBLE price. I will certainly purchase this product again and refer anyone with a smart phone to this product! Thanks Mr Shield!
customer_reviews.author: yellowsiren

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this mascara for 11 years and it is my holy grail. I will mention that the tube in the display picture is not the tube I have received when I’ve ordered it online (a different outward design) but the brush is the same and that is what I love so much about this mascara. Highly recommend it. It’s like a lash lift / fake lashes in a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Freeman

customer_reviews.title: The only mascara I'll use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mascara for years, and unfortunately I have no longer been able to find it in stores. I have very straight lashes and this is the only product that keeps them curled. I also have no issues with it clumping.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D.

customer_reviews.title: Getting difficult to find  Tell mgrs to carry this product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to remove with waterproof mascara remover. Love this product does not come off with teary eyes or during the day. I hope they don’t discontinue making this product. Some stores are not carrying it any longer
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Bizarre quality. Probably fake
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure this was counterfeit because it really irritated my eyes and this brand never bothers me
customer_reviews.author: Marna Howard

customer_reviews.title: the best mascara
customer_reviews.text: Covergirl Lashexact is the only mascara I will use. No clumps, goes on smooth. It makes my lashes full and long.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Glad to still get this mascara. Not available anymore. Why did Cover Girl discontinue this? Used to use Marathon, discontinued it, and now Lashexact. 😕
customer_reviews.author: MK69

customer_reviews.title: The i's have it
customer_reviews.text: My other mascara dried up and this one is a perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite mascara. Most mascaras tend to clump
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. Most mascaras tend to clump, but I do not have that problem with this one. I also like the waterproof because sometimes I don't remove it, and I still have mascara the next day. #lazy #millennial
customer_reviews.author: Grace Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Long, full, defined lashes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mother after she panicked when her local store discontinued this product. She loves it and insists it is the best mascara for defining and lengthening her lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Michaele Kanczel

customer_reviews.title: Misadvertised item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the waterproof mascara but didn't receive it like it was advertised. Kept it cause I had opened it and used it before realising the mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis 808

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT waterproof as described and they won't allow return. I want my money back!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley C. Kissel

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC MASCARA
customer_reviews.text: Covergirl Lashexact Mascara is the ONLY mascara I like - It's AMAZING. I wish they'd make it forever and ever!!! It doesn't clump and it goes on easily. I don't want to say much more because I don't want anyone else to buy what little stock there is left of it!! :-(
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing 'waterproof' mascara.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this mascara but it's supposed to be waterproof, but it smudged bad under my eyes. Definitely not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Bhannahpurple

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara there is hands down!
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite mascara. I have tried all sorts from drugstore to high-end and I always come back to this one. If they ever stop making it I just don't know what I will do!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: For me, this is a great everyday mascara. The results aren't falsies-dramatic, but it does enhance your lashes quite a bit, making them longer and fuller. I usually have to apply three or more coats to achieve the desired effect. Despite the time hassel, I'm still loyal to this mascara. Another plus is that it doesn't smear easily. I had it on during a rain and it didn't come off, which is surprising because it comes off easily when I wash my face.
customer_reviews.author: MariS.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mascara for myself. I like it is creamy and the brush is perfect. The mascara lady all day long. Good quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Myrian

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara. The stores around no longer has this---or ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara. The stores around no longer has this---or maybe it has been repackaged into something I couldn't recognize.
customer_reviews.author: N. P.

customer_reviews.title: used for years and i love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mascara that separates my lashes and makes them look long and healthy. I've used it for at least two years now and I won't use another mascara as long as they keep making this one!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sandman

customer_reviews.title: Good mascara for me, no irritation.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this twice before but this time design and brush different, actually an improvement but at first thought I got wrong product Lol
customer_reviews.author: Witchlua

customer_reviews.title: My everyday mascara
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a mascara that is not clumpy, and doesn't turn your lashes into tarantula legs, this is it! I'm all for making my lashes big and bold when I'm going out, but on an average day - going to work, shopping, etc - I use this mascara.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: Thick and pretty dried out when I first opened. Unfortunately I didn’t open until several days after the return deadline. Normally I love this mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Catnip

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake! Do not buy!! The packaging is different from the authentic product, the mascara has this horrible paint-like smell, and the absolute worst part is that I could NOT get this mascara off of my eyelashes no matter what I tried! Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Received washable mascara not the waterproof. I should have read reviews first, the description is inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: jellybean

customer_reviews.title: My fav mascara
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mascara! Waterproof and smudge proof. Keeps my lashes curled and doesn’t clump like most other mascaras. Can be difficult to remove though. Love how fast I get this when I place an order.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: This one looked good and it had pretty good reviews
customer_reviews.text: I needed something quick. I ran out of my other mascaras. This one looked good and it had pretty good reviews. Popped it open this morning because it arrived yesterday. Put it on in a hurry period went on smoothly and nicely and I was out the door! Love a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite go to mascara
customer_reviews.text: Like the way it makes my lashes look. Couldn't find it in any retail store. My favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product fast shipping to NZ
customer_reviews.text: So sad that it looks like this line is coming to an end. I can never find anything that works as well to highlight my lashes give them a bit extra length without any clumps. Shipping to NZ was super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Manduh

customer_reviews.title: Works alright
customer_reviews.text: It still smudges, something I was trying to avoid. it works but not what I was wanting it for.
customer_reviews.author: Mima

customer_reviews.title: Not a great mascara, but not a bad one either
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to put on and does build up, but really does not make my lashes very pronounced. But it is a good mascara for a sit around or run errands kind of day. It does not flake off or smudge during the day, which is a huge plus in my book.
customer_reviews.author: AmyL

customer_reviews.title: best lower lash mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lower lash mascara. I have gone through at least 8 tubes of this stuff. It is totally waterproof, really black, and the brush is small enough to be used without getting product all over my face. I can also use it as an upper lash mascara because it holds curl really well but I prefer the Maybelline lash sensational since it curls my lashes more. But the brush on that mascara wand is so huge that this is my top choice for lower lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product only lasted a couple weeks; think it may have been old/expired; will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Although, since it has been discontinued in stores near me, I was using another brand. After finding this on Amazon and using it again, I can tell you that the bristles are very hard. So be careful applying. But no other mascara grabs the individual lashes like this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tresko

customer_reviews.title: this is my favorite mascara its not over expensive with some crazy brush
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite mascara its not over expensive with some crazy brush, its applies nice and evenly no fuss not clumpy-
customer_reviews.author: robyn yvette

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.text: There was a long hair in my mascara when I first opened it to use it! Disgusting! I tried to return and get a hold of proper people to complain, got no were.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Ok mascara
customer_reviews.text: It is decent mascara but not as good as some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Susan  Hastings

customer_reviews.title: No clumps here
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this for 20+ years. Seems to get harder and harder to find. What I like most about it, is that it doesn't clump my eye lashes together.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite mascara. I have tried many other
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. I have tried many other, more expensive brands, and keep coming back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This is not the waterproof version although it says it is on the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Keeps curled eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: I am Japanese with very strong straight eyelashes. This mascara keeps my eyelashes curled very well. Putting little amout of face powder on eyelashes before curling makes easy to curl. It protect eyelashes from skin care products' oils and humidity. And I always use heated eyelash curler from Ardell.
customer_reviews.author: Ryoko K.

customer_reviews.title: the brush is small and don't get a good grip of the lashes
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave it 3 stars, is because I didn't get the results I expected, the brush is small and don't get a good grip of the lashes, I don't see any effect other than some color on my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Yudelka

customer_reviews.title: Different applicator, Same Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have the applicator that's shown in the picture, the one that comes with doesn't create as full of lash. I would of perferred what the picture showed but I bought it mainly for the waterproof properties which are great.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Berg

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. I remove with baby oil so pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used tis particular mascara for a long time and I am having trouble finding it locally so found it on Amazon. I really like it. I remove with baby oil so pretty easy to remove and it stays on because it is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: WMD0926

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Received it quickly and performs as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Elvis 808

customer_reviews.title: BEST mascara you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: With a lot of makeup, you really need to buy the expensive stuff, because the cheap stuff just isn't as good. This is one of the exceptions. It's way way better than any of the more expensive brands. Every time I wear this mascara, people ask me if I'm wearing fake eyelashes. This brush separates every single lash and makes them look sooo long. Also, I've never had a problem with clumping or flaking.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Paris

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this was a 3 pack when I bought it for $6.24. Great deal!! One coat Mascara and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The mascara itself isn’t bad. The wand is my favorite part, I’ve found this type of wand works best with my lashes. The packaging and container do not look like advertisement. If you want a subtle mascara then this is for you. I’m only giving it 3 stars because I had higher expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Wells

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, I just find that it flakes by the end of the work day.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Crews

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite & wish they still made it. I was so excited to find it online
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lerario

customer_reviews.title: Cover Girl mascara
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara; my eyes have become very sensitive, so changed my mascara to this one and so far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene P.

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara for sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: This mascara works well and doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes. I wear contacts, so this is especially important to me. I don't usually wear eye makeup, so the result is pleasing to me. It's probably not as dramatic as some products.
customer_reviews.author: B Bird

customer_reviews.title: decent mascara
customer_reviews.text: good mascara - I prefer the waterproof variety, but can get flaky at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: sslafter

customer_reviews.title: My go-to mascara
customer_reviews.text: My go-to mascara. Applies well, lasts a long time and doesn't clump
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: This mascara stays put.
customer_reviews.text: I love this waterproof formula, it does not flake off as many mascaras do. The brush separates and defines lashes. It can be removed easily with baby oil.
customer_reviews.author: ddmoss

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. Gives you lots of length and does not clump!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mascara, the container does a good job wiping off the brush as you pull it out to prevent clumps. Goes on smoothly, doesn't smear throughout the day. I will definitely use again
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: ive compared this to at least 5 other products and this one works well as advertised. great for a dip in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it as well as some others I have tried. I purchased this one because it wasn't supposed to clump, but it clumps for me.
customer_reviews.author: SWiandt

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea why this receives such high ratings ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why this receives such high ratings. The color is not dark and bold, does not stay, and is not water proof.
customer_reviews.author: N. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Does not clump like most, I have used this brand for years and always go back to it after I try another brand thinking its better, but the other brand ends up clumping. Love Cover Girl Mascaras
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Haas

customer_reviews.title: I'm Switching Over to Cruelty-Free Make-Up Now.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff but... I'm against animal testing. :( I see that Wet n Wild makes a Waterproof mascara now, and they ARE cruelty-free! :))))
customer_reviews.author: Precious Powder Puff

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Heard lots of good things but can find one of them. Mascara gives no volume, is too thick, and gives you raccoon eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This went to my granddaughter as a gift and was NOT waterproof. The main reason I bought it. They must have sent the wrong one or the write up was very wrong.
customer_reviews.author: no-name

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, good seller
customer_reviews.text: Fave mascara, it washes off with soap and water, but doesn't run under your eyes during the day. Great price, and I got it pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: magster

customer_reviews.title: Good mascara
customer_reviews.text: It's good mascara but doesn't show up quite as good as I thought it would. I
customer_reviews.author: Rebel4ever2

customer_reviews.title: Go-to mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to mascara. The brush is thin and small but firm so that you can apply a coat of mascara to each lash and really lengthen your lashes. HIGHLY recommend​.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: 100% Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It doesn't clump, and my lashes look natural!! Simple, natural just how I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Cristal

customer_reviews.title: $1.50 price increase 🤦‍♀️🤔
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this mascara but I just bought it in June for $5.94, how is it $1.50 more? 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Just a heads up to those purchasing that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up to those purchasing that it is waterproof. I normally don't use waterproof mascara and it shows a regular product in the photo. Other than that it is as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kasie Bradshaw

product_meta.title: COVERGIRL Lashexact Mascara Waterproof Very Black 925, .13 oz (packaging may vary)
product_meta.description:
Color:VERY BLACKThis waterproof mascara that perfectly defines lashes to give a bold eye opening look with it specially designed bristles that help lengthen lashes for a clean and sophisticated appearance that is clump-free.

BRAND STORY
By CoverGirl
feature_bullets: Contains one tube of COVERGIRL Lashexact Waterproof Mascara in Very Black. Lashexact Waterproof Mascara with our No Clump Brush gives your lashes added definition, length, & separation. This mascara is hypoallergenic & suitable for contact lenses wearers

You know that clean, ageless skin is the foundation of a fabulous look and COVERGIRL foundations, powders, and concealers make it simple. Whatever your look, COVERGIRL makeup will outlast your longest day, keeping your face radiant and natural looking

Whether you are going for a classic look that's the foundation of your style, trying an advanced technique, looking for a skin treatment or just to treat your skin, COVERGIRL makeup has the professional quality makeup to enhance your natural radiance

COVERGIRL makeup gives you the makeup you need to be who you are. Fill your makeup bag with COVERGIRL products for eyes, lips, and face. COVERGIRL makeup helps you achieve the perfect brows, lashes, lips and contouring to show off your individual style

COVERGIRL has your makeup needs covered with a wide range of makeup from mascara, eyeliner, & eyeshadow to lipstick, lip liner & lip gloss to blush, foundation & powder. There's a COVERGIRL product for every style & look. COVERGIRL- I am what I make up
